text: Ndipo pamene adauzidwa kuti: “Khulupirirani mu zimene Mulungu wavumbulutsa”, iwo adati: “Ife timakhulupirira m’mawu amene adavumbulutsidwa kwa ife.” Ndipo iwo sakhulupilira zimene zavumbulutsidwa posachedwapa ngakhale kuti ndicho choonadi, chimene chikutsimikiza zimene ali nazo. Nena: “Nanga ndi chifukwa chiyani inu mudali kupha Atumwi a Mulungu kale ngati, mudali okhulupiriradi?”
